about_the_game:
Expand your garage of vehicles with the Cotco Canyon!

Combining the benefits of a large fuel tank with a powerful engine, the Cotco Canyon is your best partner in the wild, enabling you to venture further in harsh environments.

This scout class car is included in the Year 1 Pass, Year 1 Edition, and Supreme Edition for Expeditions: a A MudRunner game, and immediately available upon its purchase.
detailed_description:
Expand your garage of vehicles with the Cotco Canyon!

This scout class car is included in the Year 1 Pass, Year 1 Edition, and Supreme Edition for Expeditions: a A MudRunner game, and immediately available upon its purchase.
